title: Home Depot, Roblox, Walmart: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Futures put Wall Street indexes on track to pull back from records
body:
U.S. stock futures slipped, suggesting indexes will edge down from all-time highs. Retail sales fell 1.1% in July from the month before as concerns about the Delta variant grew. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Tuesday’s market action.
Join Our Summer Stock-Picking Contest: Test your investing savvy against our Heard on the Street writers to predict the best-performing stock for the rest of 2021.
